title: In Regards to New Support Champion
body:
So we have a support champion coming up that is supposed to be a enchanter and also a cat (which I love). I wanted to put some suggestions out for how this could look.

Design: I am imagining a young female kitten/cat who is kind of a bookworm and is really into studying magic (Imagine twilight sparkle from MLP or tony stark or other smart nerds). I see her as having nice robes and a hood to pull up during her travels. She wears gloves with her paws sticking thru (like gamer gloves that dont have fingertips) and her ears are at the top of her head just like a real cat. Normal kitten features (no human features other than walking on 2 legs). 

Personality: She is nervous at times and uses humor as a coping mechanism. She likes to flip thru her book at random times to remind herself of the spells she needs (maybe use this in her recall). No staff or other magic weapon, she uses her paws to cast magic. I imagine she uses shields quite a bit. Another funny thing to add: she could have an ability where her magic bounces around (comically like in some movies if someone shoots or fires something and it bounces before hitting someone in the face). She shouldnt be as cocky and confident as Tristana, she should be quieter ( imagine a young kitten's mew). She doesnt care about power just knowledge and helping others.

Magic: not sure what color her magic could be, maybe some gold or purple, even blue. Her autoattack could be an orb of energy. When she casts a spell she struggles a bit and says things like "Glad thats over" or "That was tough". Essentially she vocalizes her feelings as she uses her magic. 

She is a support so maybe some lines about having other folks' backs. As for the appearance of her magic energy, it could be smooth and gentle like a flowing river, rather than erratic or aggressive looking like Syndra or Swain's magic. 

Sounds and VO: she should sound like a kid (or what a kitten kid would sound like) and talk about things kids like: mention getting ice cream cones, games other fun stuff that would add some humor to a serious situation. If she does major dmg (ultimate even) she can exclaim as if it were an accident. Her magic can have a light smooth sound (think elementalist lux). As for Taunts: something about fighting but in a wierd way such as: PUT UP YOUR DUTES....uum....dude!" (as if she forgot the enemy's name). Maybe some lines referencing other characters: "Xerath? Aren't you too old for this playground?" or "Garen! Wow your taller than I thought" just random musing that go with her being a kitten.

Other stuff: She should be very fluffy like a kitten and even be looking around when walking or standing. As for skins: idk maybe an elemental skin? ik i barely scratched the surface but these are my thoughts on "Cat champion" and im excited for when she gets here. I love cats so im looking forward to his. If my suggestions can be considered as well as any others who have thoughts on this, id be real happy. Anyways thanks for listening to me rant.

replies.body: Was it confirmed that they are in fact female and a cat? If it was, would you mind showing me?

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-21T14:40:32.889+0000)
>
> Was it confirmed that they are in fact female and a cat? If it was, would you mind showing me?

I'm pretty sure they haven't been confirmed to be a female cat
They've been confirmed to somehow be in contact with a cat but i don't think there's been anything about them being a female. I'd actually love for them to be a cute guy (Too much edginess going around)

I hope that she (yes, I want a female) is a yordle with catlike features.

We need this Bandle City update and yordles are really lacking girls. We have tons of male yordles, but just 3 females, come on.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-03-21T14:46:11.751+0000)
>
> I hope that she (yes, I want a female) is a yordle with catlike features.
> 
> We need this Bandle City update and yordles are really lacking girls. We have tons of male yordles, but just 3 females, come on.

Yordle would be a nice concept
But we need more cute bois
yordle would be fine but id like a non yordle and non vastaya kitten character. just for some variety.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=00010000000000000001,timestamp=2019-03-21T15:07:22.539+0000)
>
> yordle would be fine but id like a non yordle and non vastaya kitten character. just for some variety.

How can it be a cat character if it's not a yordle or a vastaya??
Explain this to me

um there a are several non yordle or vastaya animals in league: Nasus, renekton, volibear, Ornn. Its easy to make a cat who isnt vastayan. Vastayans are magic based animals and many have human features (Except Rengar). Also Warwick is neither.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=0001000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-03-21T16:11:56.961+0000)
>
> um there a are several non yordle or vastaya animals in league: Nasus, renekton, volibear, Ornn. Its easy to make a cat who isnt vastayan. Vastayans are magic based animals and many have human features (Except Rengar). Also Warwick is neither.

Renekton and Nasus are Shuriman ascendant basically made for war. You're hardly gonna find a "kitten" there.  Volibear and Ornn are old gods of Freljord, the pantheon of which is already established. Again, no cute kittens to be found there. Warwick is a man turned to beast by horrid and torturous experiments from a presumed chem-baron in zaun. Again no cute kittens to be found there.  The only environment where you'd find a character like the one you described is vastayan tribes or yordels.

Are you telling me you can't have a baby Egyptian cat god champ?
Also {{champion:12}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:203}}

They could introduce such a cat character, of course. But if they do, I prefer them to be a vastaya instead of another random race coming out of nowhere.

Riot introduced the vastaya to unify champions in a category when it comes to race. Before, Nami was simply a mermaid, Rengar some weird cat dude (btw, he is the reason why I think we don't need another male cat champion...) and Ahri the classic Korean fox lady.

Now with vastaya creating a connection between these races, they should keep going with it and not throw another random animal based race at us which _could_ be totally a vastaya by design, but isn't because "reasons".
havent they already done this with Twitch and Alistar? Anivia etc.? So why cant a new champ be seperate like those I mentioned?

{{champion:12}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:34}} 

These 3 champions have something in common. They are _old_. As in, they were created in a time in which Riot really didn't give a s**t about lore. They were created when summoners were still canon. Hell, do you know Anivias original lore? Anivia used to be just an alien.... yes, Anivia was a life form of another planet, inhabited by nothing but ice phoenices.

Alistar is the same deal. He got just introduced in the game because Riot thought back then "would be cool to have a minotaur in the game, wouldn't it?".

Twitch is a creation of Zauns chemicals, like Zac. So he would be the most realistic case, since even in the new lore, they can still introduce new champions which are mutated from Zaun and it would make sense with the new world they created here. Don't know if you envisioned a champion which used to be a normal cat until mutated by deadly chemicals, tho.

____________________________

Btw, they did with Anivia what they did with vastaya, too. She isn't just a random race for herself anymore. She got retconned into a demi-god. Volibear had _no relations to Anivia_ before. But both have similar traits (animal based, related to elements (Volibear - thunder, Anivia - ice)) and so they included them in a new group together with Ornn.

This is the direction we are heading to. I think it is unlikely that they will put a completely new race in the game, unrelated to the vastaya, even if the champion has _absolutely every trait which is needed to **be** a vastaya_.

Question: Why do you even mind? If a new champion would be an antropomorphic cat, like you imagined, why would it bother you if they are officially classified as a vastaya? They could look like you described, just be tagged as vastaya because it makes the most sense in the new lore, but would you really care about that?
i suppose not. Ik yordles are up for grabs too. I mostly find it weird that instead of letting all the animals be their own thing, they are now ONE race which takes away the variety.

How does it take away variety?

It is simply just an explanation for their origin, nothing more, nothing less.
Vastaya still are split in many different tribes with heavily altering appearances and cultures.

Rengar is nothing alike Nami, nor Neeko. They all are pretty different. Just because we got told that they are related to each other does not mean they are all the same.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=000100000000000000010000000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2019-03-24T09:54:04.321+0000)

Hell, do you know Anivias original lore? Anivia used to be just an alien.... yes, Anivia was a life form of another planet, inhabited by nothing but ice phoenices.

> Alistar is the same deal. He got just introduced in the game because Riot thought back then "would be cool to have a minotaur in the game, wouldn't it?".
> 
> Twitch is a creation of Zauns chemicals, like Zac. So he would be the most realistic case, since even in the new lore, they can still introduce new champions which are mutated from Zaun and it would make sense with the new world they created here. Don't know if you envisioned a champion which used to be a normal cat until mutated by deadly chemicals, tho.
> 
> ____________________________
> 
> Btw, they did with Anivia what they did with vastaya, too. She isn't just a random race for herself anymore. She got retconned into a demi-god. Volibear had _no relations to Anivia_ before. But both have similar traits (animal based, related to elements (Volibear - thunder, Anivia - ice)) and so they included them in a new group together with Ornn.
> 
> This is the direction we are heading to. I think it is unlikely that they will put a completely new race in the game, unrelated to the vastaya, even if the champion has _absolutely every trait which is needed to **be** a vastaya_.
> 
> Question: Why do you even mind? If a new champion would be an antropomorphic cat, like you imagined, why would it bother you if they are officially classified as a vastaya? They could look like you described, just be tagged as vastaya because it makes the most sense in the new lore, but would you really care about that?

I agree with this argument on multiple levels
Why does Rengar exclude cat dude but Nidalee doesnt exclude cat girl?

Nidalee is a human who can shape shift into a cat.

OP is asking for an antropomorphic cat. Which is _exactly_ what Rengar is, but Nidalee isn't.

I actually don't think we need a cat girl either (I would be ok with a cat ascended, since we are lacking female ascendeds.... and these are usually based on Egyptian gods, so Bastet would be a possible candidate), but I was especially talking about OPs vision of a male cat walking on 2 legs.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=000100000000000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2019-03-22T00:02:55.185+0000)
>
> Are you telling me you can't have a baby Egyptian cat god champ?
> Also {{champion:12}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:203}}

None of those are very human like or cute, like you wanted
so.....

And ascendants aren't just gods, they're WAR gods. And i'm pretty sure that your cutesy little my little pony kitten ain't gonna be a war god
What do you mean, like I wanted? In case you didn't notice, I'm not OP.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=00010000000000000001000000000001000000020000,timestamp=2019-03-22T14:54:33.113+0000)
>
> What do you mean, like I wanted? In case you didn't notice, I'm not OP.

I honestly don't care

But the fact is. No cutesy my little pony kitten gods
Cough cough {{champion:142}} cough cough

This makes sense. I love Yordles but i dont like Vastayans. I think its lame that instead of individual races and lores for the animals they are all stuck under one catergory (not including Gods like Anivia and Nasus).

yes but there are other non yordle and non vastayan animals. a new character can easily be one of these like Alistar or Twitch. Simply another race as new races are constantly introduced. I could see it being a yordle but some variety in origin would be nice instead of going the easy way with yordle or vastayan.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=000100000000000000010000000000010001,timestamp=2019-03-24T03:55:03.645+0000)
>
> yes but there are other non yordle and non vastayan animals. a new character can easily be one of these like Alistar or Twitch. Simply another race as new races are constantly introduced. I could see it being a yordle but some variety in origin would be nice instead of going the easy way with yordle or vastayan.

Why are you so opposed to having a new vastayan or yordle support. It's most likely going to be one of those
All of which you mentioned are quite old champions. 
Alistar is a minotaur and when he'll be reworked someday he'll most likely become a vastayan or something close to that. Vastayan has become an umbrella term for the animal-like characters that can't be reasoned to be animals any other way. It's riots way of fixing and unifying the mess of characters they made back when they didn't care about lore. Hell all the yordle characters weren't even yordles originally, but were later retconned to be yordles.
Twitch is one of zhaun's chemical creations like Zac and i'm pretty sure your cutesy my little pony kitten ain't gonna come from there and Anivia is a god grouped with Orrn and Volibear. No cutesy kittens there either

I would be happy with a yordle. The whole Vastayan thing rubs me the wrong way and idk why. I just feel like it takes away the variety it they are all one species. Now if Vastaya is just a slang/racial term for ANY human with animal features or anthropmorphic animal (other than yordles and animals made by science and gods like Nasus) then yeah thats fine. I just dont like the idea that all these animal champs are the same species (or descended from) as they are all different.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=00010000000000000001000000000001000100000000,timestamp=2019-03-25T14:14:41.739+0000)
>
> I would be happy with a yordle. The whole Vastayan thing rubs me the wrong way and idk why. I just feel like it takes away the variety it they are all one species. Now if Vastaya is just a slang/racial term for ANY human with animal features or anthropmorphic animal (other than yordles and animals made by science and gods like Nasus) then yeah thats fine. I just dont like the idea that all these animal champs are the same species (or descended from) as they are all different.

Unfortunately the only way a studious "twilight sparkle" kitten character, like you describe, can only fit in the league universe if they're of vastayan origin. If you don't mind the kitten character not having the personality you describe then sure it can be reasoned to be a result of zaun experimentation and such. The fact is, however, that the only (in lore) peaceful way for your character to be is for them to be vastayan. Or a yordle that looks a lot like a cat.
yeah i agree with you. a yordle would make sense based on what ppl are saying about bandle city. and we need more female yordles.

Welllll, Nasus and Renekton are humans turned into animals by Shuriman magic. Ornn and Volibear are Freljordian gods. Warwick was a human turned wolf in a science experiment.

The only way for there to be a naturally born animal-human and not tied to one particular nation is a Vastayan or a yordle.

I can see perhaps a new Ascended or Freljordian demigod or human experiment coming to League at one point, but for this new Champion? I don't think it's likely.

Also, the all Vastayan in-game except Rengar do have human features, but in the lore there a couple of pictures where the Vastayan don't look that human. So they do exist.
{{champion:12}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:203}}

I believe that that Alistar is from a race of humanoid bulls, so you can't find cats there.

We know nothing about Twitch, but my guess is that he's like reverse Warwick - a rat turned humanoid through science.

Kindred isn't actually human or mortal at all. They're basically Gods, or at the very least spirits.

If we're talking about humanoid animals in general, then there are a lot of options other than Yordles and Vastayans. But if we're talking about cat humanoid Champion specifically, then Vastayan and Yordles are our best and only bet. That is, unless Riot wants to go down a route of turning a human into a cat or a cat into a human.

Which... Maybe? But then that Champion would probably have to be tied to a specific region somehow. And right now, the teaser doesn't really show anything specific to region, at least to me.
The new champ could easily be from a race of humanoid cats, just like how Alistar is from a race of humanoid bulls.

It is entirely possible for Alistar to be turned into a Vastaya race via a retcon, though. He was left out of the Vastaya update for one reason or another, either because Riot has something else planned for him, or they just haven't decided what to do with him yet.

Also, the new champion could be a shape-shifter like Nidalee is, possibly preferring their animal form over their human one.

I hope Alistar is not made Vastayan. Its nice to have variety and him being a Minotaur (which is its own race) works well. He just needs more vo lines and a fleshed out lore with some more personality. I like that he is a big angry bull though.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=0001000000000000000100000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-25T14:09:05.186+0000)
>
> I hope Alistar is not made Vastayan. Its nice to have variety and him being a Minotaur (which is its own race) works well. He just needs more vo lines and a fleshed out lore with some more personality. I like that he is a big angry bull though.

Except that "minotaur" or other real world mythological beasts and creatures don't really exists or have a place in the world Riot has created. They're creating something loosely based on what we know from real life, but it's very clear they want them to be their own thing. Alistar will most likely become a vastaya, or very possibly one of the Baccai, who failed their ascension ritual.
Agreed.

You make sense. Many animal champs were humans turned to animals, or animals turned anthropomorphic through science. Alistar makes sense as Minotaurs are part of fantasy genre so his lore can stick. A yordle might be the best bet here since we just got Neeko (who should have been full gecko but oh well). Im sure we will get a roadmap here soon.
Has anyone mentioned {{champion:69}}{{champion:60}}{{champion:33}}{{champion:72}} yet?
We've mentioned shuriman ascendants, Skarner isn't really that humanoid, and no one really knows what Rammus is.
Cass and Elise are cursed, not Ascended.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=00010000000000000001,timestamp=2019-03-21T15:07:22.539+0000)
>
> yordle would be fine but id like a non yordle and non vastaya kitten character. just for some variety.

A non-yordle, non-vastaya cat? So, support Nidalee except she is just always a cat? Not interested

I would be cool with a yordle (if they are like kled or gnar full cat). But we do need a female. And this champ can go along with the Bandle city update. I used to hate yordles, but with the vgus they have recieved, and new champs like Kled, they have become some of my favorite champions.
I agree we need more female yordles, but we already have a female yordle enchanter. I think I would honestly like to see a male enchanter support.
Especially since the only three males who have any enchantment nature are Rakan, Taric and Thresh.  Who are all minor hybrids.
Agreed on the cute guy part.
I want to upvote to show my agreeance, but, y'know.

> [{quoted}](name=Arcade Lulu,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-21T14:43:50.863+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure they haven't been confirmed to be a female cat
> They've been confirmed to somehow be in contact with a cat but i don't think there's been anything about them being a female. I'd actually love for them to be a cute guy (Too much edginess going around)

Amen

Why do people keep suggesting a Yordle for the new enchanter support when
https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lulu_0.jpg
exists?

We don't need another enchanter, whimsical yordle because that will just walk all over Lulu's domain.

Maybe a male Yordle? From the teaser, it doesn't look to be as whismy as Lulu, so maybe it can be whismy in a different way?

I really don't think Riot would make another Vastayan after Neeko being very recent, and I don't know if it's going to be a human, since I feel like it might feel generic having a human walk around with a book? I don't know, Riot has been promising a Bandle City update for a long time now, and I think now would be a great time to make a new Yordle and an update alongside it.

> [{quoted}](name=AnotherPurple379,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AlE5AYxo,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-03-22T17:59:15.000+0000)
>
> Maybe a male Yordle? From the teaser, it doesn't look to be as whismy as Lulu, so maybe it can be whismy in a different way?
> 
> I really don't think Riot would make another Vastayan after Neeko being very recent, and I don't know if it's going to be a human, since I feel like it might feel generic having a human walk around with a book? I don't know, Riot has been promising a Bandle City update for a long time now, and I think now would be a great time to make a new Yordle and an update alongside it.

What teaser would you be referring to? The only instance I've heard of this new champion is when they said it would be an enchanter support after Kayle/Morg and before Mordekaiser.
I suggested a female as we have several male yordles who are more animal like and all the females are more human.
